headline.main: Share your experiences with other customers

voucher.cashed: Your voucher code %vouchercode% has already been successfully redeemed.
voucher.infoShippingvoucher: You will receive a shipping voucher for your evaluation
voucher.infoVouchervalue: You will receive a voucher for your evaluation %value%

Your personal voucher code is:

reviews.intro: Some time ago you ordered the following items. Help other customers with their purchase decisions and rate the items you bought:
reviews.productCommentPlaceholder: Tell us what you think - how is the quality and workmanship? Was the quality-price ratio of the product good/bad?
reviews.productAnonymize: Do you want to anonymize your name?

optin.description: I would like to be reminded to evaluate the purchased products after receiving the goods.
optin.coupon: You will receive a shopping voucher for a fully rated order.

error.fillOutCompletely: Please enter a rating and a text
